product_name: The North Face Cat's Meow Sleeping Bag - Women's
long_description: The North Face Cat's Meow women's sleeping bag meets the needs of female backpackers looking to save a little weight and gain a cozy night's sleep. Cut to accommodate a woman's shape, sleeping bag also provides extra insulation in the hood and foot area where women often find they need it most. Climashield(R) Prism synthetic insulation is warm, light and compressible. Top shell features extremely lightweight, wind- and water-resistant Firestorm(TM); taffeta bottom shell defends against grit/abrasion. Forehead comfort tube, insulated chest-level Heat Trap baffle and oversized draft tube backing the snag-free zipper minimize heat loss. Welded, shoulder-level zip pocket keeps watch, glasses or other necessities within easy reach. Vaulted footbox offers ergonomic comfort and warmth for your feet; brushed tricot-lined footbox adds a level of warmth and comfort. Hood features 1-hand-adjustable, color-coded drawcords; glow-in-the-dark zipper pulls make adjustments easy at night. The North Face Cat's Meow sleeping bag comes with a compression stuff sack and nylon/mesh storage bag.
short_description: The North Face Cat's Meow women's sleeping bag meets the needs of female backpackers looking to save a little weight and gain a cozy night's sleep.
